channel.title: @@relase@@! ed-scape 317 ! old school!
channel.description:
So This is my 2nd Relase so Dont flame me. This was kind of big project i maded base of allstar whole new source. I Relase this be cuz im gonna make new whole new source without any base it takes time but still i hope u dont leech this source so if u do give me credits. So this project taked like 1 and half month so 1,5 month i added d claws and some customs but post comment please

item.title: @@relase@@! ed-scape 317 ! old school!
item.dc:creator: @Kaex Kaex
item.description:
@Kaex wrote:

Uncalled:

I did, it actually kind of looked like some kind of half-assed tutorial was used and edited.

  1. You cannot tell if source code is a tutorial unless you’ve seen the tutorial.
  2. Code cannot be ‘half-assed’ unless there isn’t any conventions.
  3. I used and IDE (Eclipse) so my conventions was perfectly fine.
  4. /facepalm at you, half-assed nob head.

Read full topic

item.title: @@relase@@! ed-scape 317 ! old school!
item.dc:creator: @Kaex Kaex
item.description:
@Kaex wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:11, topic:374991”][quote author=Kaex link=topic=470959.msg3444707#msg3444707 date=1293336568]

Thx using this for ma new project… i will try to fix allstar!

Do you know the meaning of ‘Old School’? It means the old Runescape. Aka actual 317 upto 468 I believe. No dragon claws etc. Look at my C-11 (2) Release, you may learn something.
[/quote]
To be honest, your project had merely the basics of just everything.
Nothing to really be proud of.

And plus you don’t know what he’s adding into his project, so I don’t know why you’re jumping into conclusions for.
All he said was that he was going to use this.[/quote]

The basics of a starting base you mean, and I pointed the obvious point about his knoledge about “old school”, old school consists of only what was in the ‘old’ deobs of the ‘old’ Runescape, and you’re comment about basics, no need to be a twat is there? And you say basics yet you didn’t even look at the source code. Pretty pathetic discrimination of my release. [/stop being a cunt]

@ SaGo, my project old project wasn’t fucking PI you dipshit. (c-11)

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Kaex Kaex
item.description:
@Kaex wrote:

[quote=“mickeymaster, post:8, topic:374991”][quote author=Kaex link=topic=470959.msg3444865#msg3444865 date=1293349595]

Its a nice attempt, i always thought allstar could be good its just no one has taken the time to accually make it nice and neat. keep workin on it.

[center]Are you a moron? When allstar was wrote, it was like delta, it didn’t use the best Java procedures at the time, therefor it became utter shit.

Um?? you can’t talk your release was 100% Leech, now shut up alex ye?

OT: You put percentages for the amount of work you put in, you didn’t put any in, you didn’t write any of it, it was already there all you did was use the features the source already had.[/center]
[/quote][/quote]

Who the fuck are you, now shut up ye?
